      • getClassSeparability

        public double getClassSeparability()
        Calculates how well the original clusters are separable. Small values indicate bad separability, values close to 1 indicate good separability
        Returns:
        index of seperability

      • getNoiseSeparability

        public double getNoiseSeparability()
        Calculates how well noise is separable from the given clusters Small values indicate bad separability, values close to 1 indicate good separability
        Returns:
        index of noise separability

      • getModelQuality

        public double getModelQuality()
        Calculates the relative number of errors being caused by the underlying cluster model
        Returns:
        quality of the model
